Reviews.Title: Not what I expected
Reviews.Author: M. McCurdy
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera for my 7 year old niece.  She was disappointed because you couldn't see the pictures after you took them and you couldn't delete pictures as you took them.  I think this would be best suited for about a 3 or 4 year old that just wants to take pictures.  As high tech as kids are today, they expect alot from a digital camera and this one did not deliver.

Reviews.Title: Terrible!
Reviews.Author: S. Boswell
Reviews.Content: I just got this camera for my seven year old daughter and it was the biggest waste of money I ever spent.  According to the box it came in, it holds between 80 (high res.) and 273 (low res.) pictures but the camera absolutely will not take more than 5 pictures.  It keeps coming up with error codes that won't even completely show up and takes blurry lowsy pictures.  If a negative amount of stars was possible, I would have chosen that for the rating.  This is just awful.

Reviews.Title: Go photo Easy Pix 30
Reviews.Author: Mike Molloy
Reviews.Content: The camera didn't work from the time I got it out of the package. I have already sent it back to the company for my money back.

Reviews.Title: WASTE of money!!!
Reviews.Author: Sally
Reviews.Content: This camera looks decent online but don't let that fool you!  A mattel toy camera is better quality than this bubble gum machine camera!  Was so dissappointed when I opened the case for this camera, returning it was more trouble and $ than it was worth.  Buyer Beware!

Reviews.Title: Why pay $30 for a $7 Camera?
Reviews.Author: William A. Howard IV
Reviews.Content: This camera is a low resolution VGA 640 pixel item. (only good for wallet size photos) 5 years ago these went for $30 Today you can get these specs from a $7 key chain or novelty camera. For a little more than $30 you should get at least 1.3 to 2 mega pixels.

ProductInfo.Features:
640 x 480 Pixel Resolution with 8 MB SDRAM Memory
Compact Size with Built-in LCD Control Panel
Additional Functions: PC Web-Cam, Shoots Video Clips
Takes 25 Pictures in High Resolution, 102 Pictures in Low Res (320x240-QVGA)
Software: ArcSoft Photo Impression 4, ArcSoft Video Impression 2 for Fun and Editing. Windows ONLY - Not compatable with Apple / MAC.
ProductInfo.Name: Go Photo Easy Pix Digital Camera
